title: WTTF/WTB: Frank Chance card - got one now...thanks!

posts.post_title: WTTF/WTB: Frank Chance card - got one now...thanks!
posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up a Frank Chance card for my HOF Collection.  I am looking to pay $60 or less, so nothing expensive.  I'm open to just about any card right now to fill the hole.  Let me know what you have.  Thanks!

Jimi
